article.title: Canaanite religion
article.p:
Canaanite religion
, beliefs and practices prevalent in ancient Palestine and Syria during the 2nd and 1st millennia
bc
, centring primarily on the deities
El
,
Baal
, and
Anath
(
qq.v.
). From time to time it subverted the essential monotheism of the Israelites after they occupied Canaan, the Promised Land of the Old Testament.
